sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2007/L.2), the SBI takes note of the document Programming Paper for Funding the Implementation of NAPAs under the LDC Trust Fund by the GEF, and notes that US$120 million has been pledged for the Fund.

The SBI also recognizes the need for the GEF to continue efforts to mobilize additional resources to implement National Adaptation Programme of Action (NAPA) activities, invites submissions containing information on implementation of NAPAs, and invites the LDC Expert Group to consider in its stocktaking meeting experiences from the implementation of NAPAs. FINANCIAL MECHANISM (PROTOCOL)
enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
